# AI Agents Research Workspace

This workspace is dedicated to investigating real-world use cases of AI agents, comparing them with classical engineering approaches.

## Project Focus
- Real-world examples of single-agent and multi-agent systems
- Comparative analysis: AI agents vs classical engineering solutions
- Industry-specific applications and implementation patterns
- Decision criteria for when to use AI agents

## Background
User has managerial, software development, architecture, project management, and product management experience.
